title: Bigger Than a Monster Truck
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 272 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 590L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and O
description: Monster trucks are big, but some vehicles are even larger. In Bigger Than a Monster Truck, students will discover some unusual and enormous vehicles used to move people, dirt, rocks, and other things. The amazing photos show just how huge these machines are, while the text explains the special jobs they do. Book and lesson are also available at levels I and O.
